content:
If I have

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Basic.lean:334:40: warning:
unsupported option auto_param.check_exists -/
set_option auto_param.check_exists false

What's the fix? Delete? Or is there a Lean4/Mathlib4 equivalent?
It means that we need to investigate what this option is and whether it is important to keep, translate or express in a different way
does mathlib3 break without the option? What changes?
The option only disables an error. If the mathlib4 version compiles fine, we certainly don't need it.
